resources.string: "Idan ka janye izini don samun dama da amfani da bayanan da ba na mutum ba daga na'urarka, za a kashe sabisin Takardar allo na Carousel kuma za a share duk wani bayanan da aka tattara a cikin lokacin da aka kayyade a cikin dokoki da ƙa'idodi masu dacewa."
Kuna iya amfani da wannan manhajar don yin kira, duba tarihin kira, da sarrafa lambobi.

Initial setup allows you to set your basic preferences for this device. To set up your device successfully, Bluetooth system services will use the following permissions:
Kana iya amfani da wannan manhaja ma lissafi, juya yunit da kudi, da kuma kimanta biya a ajiyarka a banki.

string.name: carousel_cookies_content
string.Data: Lokacin da kuka taba hotuna da labarai a cikin Takardar allo na Carousel, za a buɗe cikakkun sigogin su a cikin burauzar ku. Amintaccen mai ba da abun ciki na ɓangare na uku zai iya ba da shawarar ƙarin abun ciki da tallace-tallacen da suka dace da abubuwan da kuke so. Idan kun amince don kunna wannan fasalin, za su sanya kukis a cikin burauzarku, kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan Sharuddan kukis. Idan kun ƙi kukis, Takardar allo na Carousel zai ci gaba da aiki amma abun ciki da shawarwarin na iya daina dacewa da ku. Kuna iya canza abubuwan da kuke so koyaushe a cikin Saittuna.

resources.string: Kukis suna ba mu damar keɓance kwarewar Kulle allon ku.
Kukis da abun cikin da aka tsara

string.name: carousel_privacy
string.Data: Karanta kuma ka amince da Sharuddan Bayanai na amintaccen mai ba da sabis na ɓangare na uku da Yarjejeniyar Mai amfani kafin amfani da Takardar allo na Carousel.

resources.string: "Takardar allo na Carousel zai nuna muku sabbin labarai duk lokacin da kuka buɗe na'urar ku"

"Domin samar muku da ingantattun sabis, hanyoyin da ke gudana akan na'urarku (ciki har da SystemHelper, RegService, da Sabis na kamfanin sadarwa) na iya aika bayanan lokaci-lokaci da ke da alaƙa da na'urarku da katin SIM (ciki har da IMEI, IMSI, MSISDN, MEID, ICCID, lambar MAC). , sigar sistem, sigar Android, ƙirar na'ura, da ƙayyadaddun kayan masarufi na asali), da kuma bayanan gano wuri na kusa (ciki har da yanki, haɗin kai, mai gano yanki, da ID na tashar tushe) zuwa mai ɗaukar kaya ta hanyar WLAN, hanyar sadarwar bayanan wayar hannu, ko SMS kyauta. Kamfanin sadarwa yayi alƙawarin nazarin bayanan da suka dace kawai don haɓaka ingancin sabis ko don samar da ayyuka na musamman ko fasaha, kuma ba zai bayyana mahimman bayanai ga ɓangarori na uku ta kowane nau'i da ke bayyana ku da kanku ba. Ƙayyadadden bayanin mai ɗaukar kaya zai yi rinjaye. Tuntuɓi mai ɗaukar hoto game da farashin amfani da wannan sabis ɗin."
"<Data>By turning on this feature, you're agreeing to the <a href=%1$s>Mi Smart Hub Privacy Policy</a >.</Data>"
Kana iya amfani da wannan ka duba lokaci, amfani da kirga lokaci, agogon kasashen duniya, agogon gudu, saita kararrawa, da sauran su.
Kan iya zabar kashe isowa ga wurin da kake a cikin Saittuna > Sirrin kariya > Sarrafa ko takaita Bayanan sirri ko takaita izini ma kowace manhaja a cikin Tsaro.

"Idan ka na nemar gyara sabisin da ake ba ka, kamfanin hanyar sadarwar da ka zaba na iya aika bayanan ka na sirri da bayanan wannan na'urar zuwa saba ta hanya yin amfani da sadarwa Wi-Fi ko kuma bayanan mobayil. Za'a yi amfani da wannan bayani ma lissafi ne kadai domin gyara kyaun sabis da kuma bada abubuwa da dama. Ba za'a yi amfani da wannan bayani dan gano kai da kan ka ba kuma ba za'a bayyana ba."
Kana iya amfani da wannan manhaja ma kewayawa, da kuma ganin abubuwan da aka hada, karfin iska, da tsawon duwatsu.
Ka na a shirye ka ji dadi
Ja zuwa sama ka shiga sistem

Santar abubuwa na ba da iko ma abubuwa da sabis daga hanyoyi da yawa. Nan kana iya karanta jaridu, kallon bidiyoyi, duba abubuwa da ake sabuntawa kullum, da kuma samun shawarwari akan abubuwan daya kunsa.
Ci gaba da rike yatsun biyu a kasa dan ka kunna bada hanya.

"Lokacin da kuka taɓa hotuna da labarai a cikin Takardar allo na Carousel, za mu buɗe cikakken sigar su a cikin mai binciken ku. Taboola, amintaccen mai ba da abun ciki na ɓangare na uku, zai iya ba da shawarar ƙarin abun ciki da tallan da suka dace da abubuwan da kuke so. Idan kun yarda kunna wannan fasalin, Taboola zai sanya kukis a kan na'urarku ta hanyar mai bincike, kamar yadda aka bayyana a Sharuddan kukis. Idan kun ƙi amfani da kukis, Abubuwan Takardar allo na Carousel na Fuskar bangon waya za su ci gaba da bayyana akan allon kulle kuma za a buɗe cikakkun labaran a cikin burauzar ku, amma ba za a zaɓi ƙarin shawarwarin musamman ba. Kuna iya canza abubuwan da kuka fi so kowane lokaci a cikin Saittuna."
Yanke shawara ko kuna son amintattun masu samar da abun ciki na ɓangare na uku su yi amfani da kukis don keɓance shawarwarin abun ciki da tallace -tallace dangane da abubuwan da kuke so.
Kukis da abun cikin da aka tsara
"Idan ba ka hada da Wi-Fi a yanzu ba, na'urarka zai bayanan mobayil. Amfani da bayanan mobayil na iya janyo karin caji na kudi."
"Yi amfani da zanen yatsan ka dan ka bude na'urar ka, ka bincika cinikin Mi Pay, ko ka shiga cikin asusun manhaja da sabisin su."
"Yi amfani da zanen yatsan ka dan ka bude na'urar ka, ko ka shiga cikin asusun manhaja da sabisin su."

"Ka kunna TalkBack ta hanyar danna allon da yatsosin ka biyu sama da mintuna 10. TalkBack na bada martani na murya na mutanen da ke da matsalar gani. Idan ka kunna shi ba tare da sani ba, taba madannin Soke, sa'an nan sai ka taba allon so biyu."
Sabisin Tsarin aiki na Manhajar hanzari shine tsarin sabis na asali wanda ke goyan bayan rarraba manhaja da aiki da sauri.
Mi Link lets you quickly connect to Bluetooth devices.

Xiaomi service framework (Mi Push, Analytics, and MIUIBI) is a basic system service that provides push notifications, risk prevention, statistics, and analytics capabilities. In order to provide these services, we need to collect and process relevant and necessary personal information. When collecting and processing such information, we will comply with applicable laws, regulations, and other normative documents.

"In order to provide push notification functionality, we need to collect device identifiers (OAID and encrypted Android ID), information about the apps that use the push service (e.g. app package name, version, and runtime status), device manufacturer, device model, device memory, operating system version, region, name of the SIM card carrier name, current network type, and the Wi-Fi status. You can change the way you receive push notifications in Settings, and we'll provide you with push notifications based on your preferences, for which we'll also collect the information about your preferences including whether you choose to block notifications or not, and whether you allow them to appear on Lock screen. For the purposes of risk prevention, statistics, and analytical processing, we need permission to connect to the network and access your location, device IMEI, device IMSI, device identifiers (OAID, MAC address, and encrypted Android ID), device manufacturer, device model, device memory, operating system version, region, and current network type. The above information will be collected once a day for as long as you use this device."
Fulogin wasanni na ba ka izinin shiga, kirkirar oda, kammala biya, amfani da kufon, da halartar kiran kasuwa.

"Don yin aiki daidai, Google Play na bukatar ya hada da intanit, ya iso ga wurin da kake, iya nada odiyo, kiran waya, isowa ga aukuwa na kalanda, tarihin kira, senso, ma'aji, kyamara, bayanan na'ura, da asusu."
Babu hanyar sadarwa. Duba Sharuddan Bayanai na wannan faifan madannin a %s.
"Sabis na IMS yana ba da damar sadarwa ta asali kuma ana amfani da shi don babban ma'anar sauti da kiran bidiyo."
Zabi faifan madannin da zaka yi amfani da shi dan rubuta sakonni, yin rubutu, da kuma wasu ababuwa daban. Ka sani ka na iya sanya wani faifan madanni daban daga baya.
"Sabisin Sadarwar Intanet na Xiaomi yana ba ku damar ganowa, haɗawa, da sadarwa tare da wasu na'urorin Xiaomi."

"小米互联互通为向您提供包括：影音互联、应用生态融合、文件系统、硬件协同和设备中心等跨设备互联互通场景的基础功能，需要联网并调用您设备的如下权限： \u0009\u0009互传： \u0009\u0009读写设备上的照片及文件 \u0009\u0009用于发送和接收传输的文件 \u0009\u0009获取位置信息 \u0009\u0009用于实现蓝牙/WLAN状态下的文件传输功能 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭蓝牙 \u0009\u0009使用蓝牙扫描附近可互传文件的设备 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭WLAN \u0009\u0009使用WLAN扫描周围设备并传输文件 \u0009\u0009连接附近的设备 \u0009\u0009发现并连接到附近的设备 \u0009\u0009影音互联（小米妙播、投屏）： \u0009\u0009开启或关闭蓝牙 \u0009\u0009使用蓝牙扫描和连接附近可用设备 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭WLAN \u0009\u0009使用WLAN扫描附近可投屏的设备 \u0009\u0009向其他设备传输数据 \u0009\u0009用于在两台设备间建立蓝牙连接并交换数据 \u0009\u0009获取设备的位置信息 \u0009\u0009用于获取附近可投屏的设备信息 \u0009\u0009录制设备内部音频 \u0009\u0009用于投屏、镜像过程中将声音传输至其他设备播放 \u0009\u0009读写设备上的照片、视频、音频 \u0009\u0009用于发送及接收传输的文件 \u0009\u0009读取设备MAC地址 \u0009\u0009用于互联设备的识别 \u0009\u0009获取屏幕上的信息 \u0009\u0009在录制或投屏时，提供此功能的服务会获取在您的屏幕上显示或从您的设备播放的任何敏感信息，包括音频、密码、付款信息、照片和消息等 \u0009\u0009应用生态融合（应用接力、妙享桌面）： \u0009\u0009开启或关闭蓝牙 \u0009\u0009使用蓝牙扫描和连接附近可用设备 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭WLAN \u0009\u0009使用WLAN扫描附近可投屏的设备 \u0009\u0009读取设备MAC地址 \u0009\u0009用于互联设备的识别 \u0009\u0009读写设备上的照片、视频、音频 \u0009\u0009用于发送及接收传输的文件 \u0009\u0009向其他设备传输数据 \u0009\u0009用于在两台设备间建立蓝牙连接并交换数据 \u0009\u0009录制设备内部音频 \u0009\u0009用于投屏、镜像过程中将声音传输至其他设备播放 \u0009\u0009获取屏幕上的信息 \u0009\u0009在录制或投屏时，提供此功能的服务会获取在您的屏幕上显示或从您的设备播放的任何敏感信息，包括音频、密码、付款信息、照片和消息等 \u0009\u0009文件系统（跨设备剪贴板、笔记跨设备拍照）： \u0009\u0009开启或关闭蓝牙 \u0009\u0009使用蓝牙扫描和连接附近可用设备 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭WLAN \u0009\u0009使用WLAN扫描附近可投屏的设备 \u0009\u0009读写设备上的照片、视频、音频 \u0009\u0009用于发送及接收传输的文件 \u0009\u0009读取剪切板 \u0009\u0009允许应用读取复制的内容 \u0009\u0009硬件协同（网络协同、键鼠协同、相机协同）： \u0009\u0009开启或关闭蓝牙 \u0009\u0009使用蓝牙扫描和连接附近可用设备 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭WLAN \u0009\u0009使用WLAN扫描附近可投屏的设备 \u0009\u0009读写设备上的照片、视频、音频 \u0009\u0009用于发送及接收传输的文件 \u0009\u0009相机 \u0009\u0009调用相机拍摄照片和录制视频 \u0009\u0009设备中心： \u0009\u0009开启或关闭蓝牙 \u0009\u0009使用蓝牙扫描和连接附近可用设备 \u0009\u0009开启或关闭WLAN \u0009\u0009使用WLAN扫描附近可投屏的设备 \u0009\u0009录制设备内部音频 \u0009\u0009用于投屏、镜像过程中将声音传输至其他设备播放 \u0009\u0009读写设备上的照片、视频、音频 \u0009\u0009用于发送及接收传输的文件 如果您不同意调用以上必要权限，将导致小米互联互通服务无法正常使用。 因系统版本、设备型号存在差异，您当前所使用设备提供的小米互联互通服务可能不同，请参考官网%s获取更详细信息。"

Wannan yana ba da damar yin amfani da bayanan mobayil da haɗin GPS dangane da buƙatun mai amfani. Daidaitawar asusu da sauran abubuwa na iya buƙatar yin amfani da bayanan mobayil gwargwadon bayanan wayoyin.
Sai dai idan kuna da tsari tare da bayanai marasa iyaka, amfani da bayanan mobayil na iya samar da ƙarin kuɗin na kamfanin sadarwa. Ya yi amfani da bayanan mobayil duk da haka?

Idan shawarwarin talla da aka tsara na kashe, har yanzu za ku ga adadin tallace-tallace iri ɗaya kamar lokacin da fasalin ke kunne. Amma tallan ba zai zama mai dacewa ba saboda ba za su dogara da abubuwan da kake so ba.

Idan shawarwarin talla da aka tsara na kashe, har yanzu za ku ga adadin tallace-tallace a cikin manhajar sistem kamar lokacin da fasalin ke kunne. Amma talla daga Xiaomi da dandalin wasu bangare daban ba zasu zama masu dacewa ba saboda ba za su dogara da abubuwan da kake so ba.

"Sabunta sistem din manhaja da abokan hulɗa na ɓangare na uku ta hanyar GetApps don samun damar amfani da sabbin fasalolin su. Kuna iya kashe sabuntawa ta atomatik a cikin GetApps > Saittuna > Sabuntawa ta atomatik."
Bada izini ma manhaja da gidajen yanar gizo don isowa ga bayanin wurin ku don samar da sabis na tushen wuri
"Ana amfani da System Daemon don inganta tsarin kwanciyar hankali da aiki. Don samun damar yin aiki daidai, wannan sabis ɗin yana buƙatar izini don samun dama da adana abubuwa zuwa ma'ajin na'ura."

"Taimaka kyautatawar ƙwarewar ka ta hanyar aika bayanan bincike, na'ura, da kuma bayanan amfanin manhaja ta atomatik zuwa Xiaomi. Wannan zai taimaka inganta rayuwar batir, sistem da kwanciyar hankali a aikace, da ƙari. Bayanan da za ku aika za su ƙunshi cikakken bayani game da na'urarku da yadda kuke amfani da ita (misali matakin batir, tsarin aiki da manhaja da kurakurai) Za a yi amfani da bayanan don inganta na'urorin Xiaomi. Kashe wannan fasalin ba zai shafi ikon na'urarka ba don aika bayanan da ake buƙata don muhimman ayyuka kamar sabuntawar sistem da tsaro. Kuna iya sarrafa wannan fasalin daga Saittuna > Kalmomin sirri & tsaro > Sirri > Amfani da bincike."

"Taimaka inganta ƙwarewar ka ta hanyar aika bayanan bincike, na'ura, da kuma bayanan amfani na manhaja da kai tsaye zuwa Xiaomi. Wannan zai taimaka inganta rayuwar batir, sistem da daidaiton manhaja, da sauan su."
Shirin karatun Fasaha na Mai amfami
Taimakon mu a wurin gyara kayayyakin mu, da sabis ta hanyan rabar da lissafin amfanin da nazarin ka tare da mu.
System Daemon allows you to transfer data from your device when its screen is damaged.

"Don bada izini ma sauran na'urorin ku masu jituwa waɗanda kuka haɗa zuwa wannan na'urar don samun damar tarihin kira. Wannan zai faru ne kawai lokacin da kake buƙatar yin amfani da tarihin kira ta hanyar wata na'ura. Tarihin kira da lambobin sadarwa da tsarin ke rabawa ta Bluetooth za a adana su kawai a cikin na'urorin ku kuma a raba su tare da izininku."

Na isowa ga halayen waya, rikodin kira, da dakatar da nadi lokacin kira mai shigowa

"Don ba da damar sauran na'urorin ku masu jituwa waɗanda kuke haɗa su zuwa wannan na'urar don isowa ga lambobin sadarwa. Wannan zai faru ne kawai lokacin da kuka kunna Bluetooth ko shirya lambobinku yayin da Bluetooth ke kunne."

"Taboola yana ba da shawarari na Takardar allo na Carousel, amintaccen mai ba da abun ciki na ɓangare na uku. Don samar da wannan abun ciki, Taboola yana buƙatar samun dama da adana bayanan da ba na sirri ba daga na'urarka, gami da yaren tsarin ku da nau'in burauza. Kuna iya koyan yadda Taboola ke amfani da bayanan da aka tattara a cikin Sharuddan Bayanai da Yarjejjeniyar Mai Amfani na Taboola. Karanta kuma ka yarda da sharudda da yanayi da aka bayar a cikin waɗannan takaddun kafin ka ci gaba. Idan ba ku yarda ba, za a kashe ayyukan Takardar allo na Carousel."
Samun karin bayani game da kariya na sirri
Kariyar bayanan sirri shine alkawari a bayan tsarin kayan mu

Mun dage da maka alkawari da kare bayanan sirrinka. Da fifikon bincike da ci gaba a fannin tsaro na bayanai, Xiaomi koyaushe yana aiki akan inganta hanyoyin, ayyuka, da hanyoyin fasaha waɗanda ke kiyaye bayananka. Hakanan muna raba nasarorinmu na ƙarshe tare da abokan haɗin gwiwa don tabbatar da sirrinku a duk faɗin.
"Dole mu kare bayananka na sirri bisa ga dokoki, ka'idoji, da sharuddan bayanai."

The SIM card activation service verifies the information of the currently inserted SIM card to make sure that system services can work normally. These services include Find device, Mi Message, creating Xiaomi Accounts using phone numbers, and syncing messages and call history.
"Ba'a samu layin waya ba. Tabbatar an sa Layin waya daidai kuma ka nada isashen kudi a ciki."
"A bada damar hadawa da hanyar sadarwa bayanan intanet na mobayil? Idan ka yi hakan, za'a yi amfani da Layin wayar da ka sa a hada da hanyoyin sadarwa na bayanan intanetin mobayil."
"Idan za ka sa Layin waya, ka karanta umarnin da na'urar da ya zo da shi."

"Saka katin SIM kafin ci gaba. Nemo na'urar da ayyuka masu alaƙa da aiki tare ba za su kasance cikakke gare ku ba idan kun ƙirƙiri lissafi ba tare da katin SIM ba. Wannan na'urar tana tallafawa eSIM. "
Layin wayar bai iya hadawa da hanyar sadarwa
Layin wayarka bai iya haduwa da kamfanin sadarwa dake aiki. Tabbatar ka nada isashen kudi a ciki sai ka sake gwadawa.
Tabbatar ka san yadda ake amfani da ishara cikakken allo kafin zabin wannan aiki.

In order to perform a system update, we need to collect the device IMEI, device IMSI, device identifiers (OAID and encrypted Android ID), Xiaomi Account, device manufacturer, device model, network operator, device memory, operating system version, region, language, connectivity, network type, and IP address.
Sabisin fulogi na Allon farko yana ba ku fasali na asali kamar Allon farko, tsarin UI, da hotunan kariyar kwamfuta.

"Samu hotuna masu saba kyau da labarai masu ban sha'awa da aka isar da su zuwa Allon kulle yau da kullun. Wannan fasalin ba zai yi amfani da bayanan ku don keɓancewa ba tare da izinin ku ba. Karanta kuma ka yarda da mai bada abun ciki na ɓangare na uku Sharuddan Bayanai da Yarjejjeniyar Mai Amfani kafin amfani da wannan fasalin."
